required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability Study on a Single Dose of GW842166X in Healthy Male and Female Subjects.
clinical_study.official_title: A 2 Part Open-label, Randomised, Crossover Study to Compare the Effects of Formulation, Food and Particle Size on the Pharmacokinetic Profiles of a Single 175mg Dose of GW842166X in Healthy Male and Female Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: GW842166X is a selective non-cannabinoid CB2 receptor agonist, which is undergoing clinical development as a novel oral treatment for inflammatory pain. The purpose of the study is to compare the effects of formulation, food and particle size on the pharmacokinetic profiles of a single 175mg dose of GW842166X in healthy male and female volunteers.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Timepoints: Pre dose, 15 mins, 30 mins, 45 mins, 1hr, 1.5hrs, 2hrs, 2.5hrs, 3hrs, 4hrs, 5hrs, 6hrs, 8hrs, 10hrs, 12hrs, 16hrs, 24hrs, 48hrs, 48hr, 96hrs (post dose)

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma GW842166 AUC (0-t), tlag,tmax and t1/2
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Timepoints: Pre dose, 15 mins, 30 mins, 45 mins, 1hr, 1.5hrs, 2hrs, 2.5hrs, 3hrs, 4hrs, 5hrs, 6hrs, 8hrs, 10hrs, 12hrs, 16hrs, 24hrs, 48hrs, 48hr, 96hrs (post dose)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Body weight >50 Kg and BMI within the range 18.5-29.9 Kg/m2 inclusive.
- Healthy as judged by a responsible physician.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Positive pre-study urine screen for drugs of abuse or alcohol breath test.
